definition: clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats

sentences.english: The March wind is fretful, fretting the languid wave into murmurs .
sentences.chinese: 三月的风躁动不安，惹得倦怠的波浪哗哗作响。

sentences.english: She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起一张纸，把它哗哗啦啦地塞到打字机中。

sentences.english: The water gushed out of the tap.
We could hear the swish and gurgle of water against the hull.
sentences.chinese: 我们能听到水拍打船体时的哗哗声。

sentences.english: The hooter was ululant; the rail clattered;
The rainwater is splashing down from the hole of the roof.
sentences.chinese: 雨水从屋顶的破洞处哗哗往下流。

sentences.english: We could hear the loud brawl of a brook behind the house.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以听到房子后面小坝的哗哗流水声。

sentences.english: The she would hurry to the kitchen and wash the sparerids.
sentences.chinese: 她急匆匆地奔向厨房，厨房里立刻传来哗哗的水声。

sentences.english: The angry elephant crashed through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那头愤怒的大象哗哗啦啦地跑过这片森林。

sentences.english: In the upside-down cabin, water spouted through the hatch.
sentences.chinese: 水哗哗地从舱口涌进翻倒的船舱。

sentences.english: The digits crashed all about me. I was submerged in infinity.
sentences.chinese: 数字在我四周哗哗落下，我浸没在无限之中。

sentences.english: By shallow rivers, to whose falls Melodious birds sing madrigals.
sentences.chinese: 随着浅浅溪水的哗哗流响，鸟儿欢乐歌唱，婉啭悠扬。

sentences.english: A flag on the top of the house stirred loudly in the strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶上的一面旗子在狂风中哗哗啦啦地抖个不停。

sentences.english: The river brawled over the rapids.
Look at the water blasting out of the showerhead!
sentences.chinese: 看，水从喷头里哗哗地流出来。

definition: (onom.) sound of a crash/with a crash
(onom.) pattering sound/drip drip (of water)/tick tock (of clock)/also pr. [di1 da5]
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
with a crash/with a thunderous noise
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
(onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
